gnv65, the second link seems to be an epub not a rar. Could you please check.
epub title : on food and cooking by Harold McGee.

SectorVector , that 2nd link contains RAR file with both ePUB & MOBI versios.
Book you requested is available here at TPB in PDF format already:
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7013211/On_Food_and_Cooking__Harold_McGee_%5Bfull_photos_and_tables%5D.pdf

I got the ePUB from a demonoid torrent. I have uploaded it to bayfiles. If you want ePUB only, download it from here:
http://bayfiles.com/file/pXvl/ow7QFz/On_Food_and_Cooking_-_Harold_Mcgee.epub

You can see the cover here:
http://img840.imageshack.us/img840/465/onfoodandcookingharoldm.jpg
